segments.text: Hi Joe , how are you doing today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Things are going good today . How have you been doing , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Things are going well for me , Joe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Want to go see a movie tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My parents are taking me to dinner tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you go with me to the movies on Friday night , instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What movie did you want to see ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a new horror flick about a rapist serial killer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking that I would like to see “ The Secret Life of Bees . ”
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh great ! Sounds like something I need to bring Kleenex to !
segments.speaker: S2
